title: USB not read on pixel 2
content:
I am unable to connect Android auto to my car. There is an error that says unable to read USB.

I was able to use Android auto on the screen in the car when I first bought it in 2017 then some time after that it stopped working. I thought maybe it was something to do with the car but then my husband bought a pixel 3 has no issue connecting. 

From what I've read online there was an update to pixel 2 at some point and since then users have complained it hasn't worked. I've tried numerous suggestions in different forums but none have worked. 

How do I fix the USB issue? I'd really like to use the map function while I'm driving.
